title: What price water
creator_credit: David Cons, G. Buckland-Smith and GBS Productions
brief_description: Britain is the leading exporter of desalination plants. All over the world plants are providing fresh water for consumption by industry, agriculture and in the home. Details the extensive research and development programmes on a number of techniques: multi-stage flash distillation, electrodialysis, reverse osmosis and freezing.
